head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MASCH, ROBERT B.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MASCH, ROBERT B.

block.p: MASCH-Robert B. 76 of Cortlandt Manor, NY, formerly of Freeport, on October 20, 2000. Devoted husband of Dolly. Loving father of Jan, Debra, Stuart, Roger, and daughter-in-law Carol. Grandfather of Jody Lynn and Rebecca. Services will be today, October 23, at 10 AM, Riverside Memorial Chapel, 21 West Broad St, Mount Vernon, NY. Interment at Sharon Gardens Cemetery, Valhalla, NY. Donations to UJ Federation and Memorial Sloan-Kettering.

MASCH-Robert B. 76 of Cortlandt Manor, NY, formerly of Freeport, on October 20, 2000. Devoted husband of Dolly. Loving father of Jan, Debra, Stuart, Roger, and daughter-in-law Carol. Donations to UJ Federation and Memorial Sloan-Kettering.
